summary: The authority of a man, who runs a parallel government in Mumbai, is challenged. His son rises to face his enemies.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Abhishek Bachchan|Kay Kay Menon|Supriya Pathak|Katrina Kaif|Tanishaa Mukerji|Rukhsar Rehman|Anupam Kher|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Deepak Shirke|Ishrat Ali|Zakir Hussain|Ravi Kale|Raju Mavani|Jeeva|Anant Jog|Mangala Kenkre|Priyanka Kothari|Virendra Saxena|Shivam Shetty|Nagesh Bhonsle|Rasika Joshi|Saurabh Dubey|Raju Thakkar|Uday Sabnis|Anil Yadav|Dinesh Lamba|Saksham Dayma|Gautam Shetty|Rushad Rana|Diwakar Dhayani|Carran Kapoor|Shree Rammy Pandey|Nitinn Rana
title: Sarkar
